testcase.purpose: Check if method post which in NotificationManager interface exists.
Check if method update which in NotificationManager interface exists.
Check if method remove which in NotificationManager interface exists.
Check if method removeAll which in NotificationManager interface exists.
Check if method get which in NotificationManager interface exists.
Check if method getAll which in NotificationManager interface exists.
Check if the parameter NotificationManager which in get method ok
Check if the parameter NotificationManager which in remove method ok
Check if the parameter NotificationManager which in update method ok
Check if the readonly attribute notification
Check whether calling update() method with notification not posted earlier throws an exception
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works with minimal arguments
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works with partial attributes in notificationInitDict
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works with additional attributes in notificationInitDict
Check if attribute appid of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute appControl of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute vibration of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute iconPath of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute soundPath of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute statusType of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute content of Notification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute postedTime of Notification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute title of Notification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute id of Notification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute type of Notification exists, has appropriate type
Check if NotificationManager.post method works properly with ONGOING statusType
Check if NotificationManager.post method works properly with PROGRESS statusType
Check if NotificationManager.post method works properly with SIMPLE statusType
Check if NotificationManager.removeAll works properly
Check if NotificationManager.getAll method works
Check if NotificationManager does not exist
Check if NotificationObject does not exist
Check if Notification does not exist
Check if NotificationManager is extendable
Check if StatusNotification is extendable
Check if NotificationDetailInfo exists
Check if StatusNotification exists
Check if NotificationDetailInfo is extendable
Check if NotificationDetailInfo's constructor works.
Check for NotificationDetailInfo.subText attribute.
Check if NotificationDetailInfo's constructor works with non-optional arguments.
Check for NotificationDetailInfo.mainText attribute.
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=ONGOING and progressType=BYTE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=ONGOING and progressType=PERCENTAGE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=PROGRESS and progressType=BYTE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=PROGRESS and progressType=PERCENTAGE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=SIMPLE and progressType=BYTE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=SIMPLE and progressType=PERCENTAGE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=THUMBNAIL and progressType=BYTE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for statusType=THUMBNAIL and progressType=PERCENTAGE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for progressValue=-1 and progressType=BYTE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for progressValue=0 and progressType=BYTE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for progressValue=0 and progressType=PERCENTAGE
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for progressValue=max and progressType=BYTE
Check if constructor accepts incorrect backgroundImagePath
Check if constructor accepts incorrect iconPath
Check if constructor accepts incorrect soundPath
Check if constructor accepts incorrect subIconPath
Check if attribute subIconPath of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if constructor accepts incorrect thumbnails
Check if attribute detailInfo of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute number of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute backgroundImagePath of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute thumbnails of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute progressType of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute progressValue of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type for BYTE progressType
Check if attribute progressValue of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type for PERCENTAGE progressType
Check if StatusNotification's constructor works for progressValue=100 and progressType=PERCENTAGE
Check if constructor accepts max number.
Check if constructor accepts min number.
Check if NotificationManager.post method works properly with THUMBNAIL statusType
Check with missing non-optional argument - NotificationManager.post
Check type conversions for notification argument of NotificationManager.post method
Check if update method is not accepting invocation without argument
Check if update throws exception when argument is incorrect
Check if method getAll of NotificationManager accepts extra argument
Check if method removeAll of NotificationManager accepts extra argument
Check if attribute ledColor of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute ledOffPeriod of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if attribute ledOnPeriod of StatusNotification exists, has appropriate type
Check if Notification can be extended
